message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $13,000.  It's a great deal, and I think you'll find it's worth every penny.  Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. I'm really interested in the product, but I need to stay within my budget. Can you meet me at $10,000?

Bob, I understand you're working with a budget. While I can't go as low as $10,000, I'm willing to meet you halfway at $11,000. This price still gives me a fair return on my investment, and it's closer to what you're looking for. Let me know if you're interested.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to go up to $10,800. Can you consider this price point?

Bob, I see we're getting closer.  While $10,800 is a bit below what I'm hoping for, I'm willing to come down to $11,500. This is my final offer, as I need to make sure I can cover my costs.  Let me know if you're able to meet me at this price.
I understand that $11,500 is your final offer, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to go up to $11,200. Can you reconsider this price point?
